TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Cursors extends System.Object
public ref class Cursors abstract sealed

span.span: Defines a set of default cursors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此静态类对应用程序定义一组常见的默认光标。This static class defines a set of default cursors common to applications. 定义游标的各种静态属性不可直接在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，但可通过两种可行机制间接使用：The various static properties defining cursors are not directly usable in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but are indirectly used through two possible mechanisms: - 类对任何执行类型转换[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]采用类型的属性，这样，值为枚举指定为属性值的计算结果将为静态之一属性。The class performs type conversion on any [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] attribute that takes type , such that a value of the enumeration specified as the attribute value will evaluate to one of the static properties. - 可以通过使用静态属性值[X:static 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)。A static property value can be used through the [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AppStarting As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ AppStarting { System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在应用程序启动时显示的 。

span.span: Gets the that appears when an application is starting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常指示系统正在加载的信息，但用户界面可以处理输入。The typically indicates that the system is loading information, but the user interface can handle input. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 有关，请参阅备注。See Remark on .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Arrow As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ Arrow { System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 箭头通常是默认光标。The arrow is typically the default cursor. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 有关，请参阅备注。See Remark on .

public: static property System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ ArrowCD { System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ get(); };

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Cross As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ Cross { System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此光标通常显示在区域将在其中执行绘制操作。This cursor typically appears over regions in which a drawing operation can be performed. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 有关，请参阅备注。See Remark on .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Hand As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ Hand { System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 手动通常指示在指针位于链接。The hand typically indicates the pointer is over a link. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 有关，请参阅备注。See Remark on .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Help As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ Help { System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取帮助 ，它是箭头和问号的组合。

span.span: Gets a help which is a combination of an arrow and a question mark.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，提供上下文相关帮助时，会显示此光标。Typically, this cursor is displayed when context-sensitive help is available. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 有关，请参阅备注。See Remark on .

public: static property System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ IBeam { System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 有关，请参阅备注。See Remark on .
